name: F5 BIG-IQ
description: F5 BIG-IQ Project has assets for Running Script on BIG-IP, Upgrade BIG-IP device and Rollback, Retrieve Machine ID, Check BIG-IP Current software version, Create Device Backup, Discover device, Import device, and Reboot Device

document.name: Run Script on BIG-IP
document.description: Creates, executes, and gets result of script run on target BIG-IP over BIG-IQ

ff7c.name: ViewData
ff7c.description: Show failure result and option for next step

incoming.message:
Failed to run script, see error response. Select "Retry Script" to retry executing script or select "End Job" to end this job









.

15b4.name: ViewData
15b4.description: Show failure result and option for next step

incoming.message:
The number of reattempts to query script status exceeded expected number of reattempts. Select "Query Status" to query status again or select "End Job" to end the job.

See query script response below.









.

9e84.name: ViewData
9e84.description: Show failure result and options for next steps

incoming.message:
Failed to create script, see error response. Select "Retry" to retry call to create script or select "End Job" to end this job.









.

5c4a.name: ViewData
5c4a.description: Show failure result and options for next steps

incoming.message:
Failed to get the script status, see error response below. Select "Retry" to retry call to get script status or select "End Job" to end this job.









.

incoming.header: Not Enough Disk Space for Upgrade
incoming.message:
The amount of disk space found on BIG-IP device is not enough for a software upgrade. See amount of disk space found below. If possible to reformat disk for more space, do so and select "Check Disk" to check disk space again. If not possible, select "End Job" to end job.

8e26.description: Check if Any Devices Have Target Image as Active

5a4a.name: ViewData
5a4a.description: Show devices with target image as active and present options to operator

incoming.header: Device Found to Have Target Image as Active
incoming.message:
One or more devices have been found to have the target image for upgrade already active. See devices below where current image version is seen assigned to "currentVersionBuild".

It might be intended to upgrade BIG-IP device with same image version as already found as its active version.

Select "Upgrade" to upgrade all devices regardless of whether or not target image for upgrade is already found to be active for one or more devices.

Select "Do Not Upgrade" to not upgrade any devices and end the job.

e368.name: ViewData
e368.description: Show error message and select options

incoming.message: Failed to get active volume of one or more BIG-IP devices. See target volume to rollback to in data below. Select "Retry" retry getting active volume of the BIG-IP devices. Select "Skip Reboot" to continue to attempt device discovery and import of devices.

5f1c.name: transformation
5f1c.summary: Compare Active Volume to Target Volume for BIG-IP Rollback
5f1c.description: Checks active volume on BIG-IP device(s) and compares to target volume and returns devices for reboot where active volume does not equal target volume

f1f8.name: ViewData
f1f8.description: Show error message and select options

incoming.message: Failed to import one or more BIG-IP devices. See details below. Select "Retry" retry importing the BIG-IP devices. Select "Continue" to continue to end the job.
